verses.name: Numbers 16:8
verses.text: And Moses said unto Korah, Hear, I pray you, ye sons of Levi:

verses.name: Numbers 16:9
verses.text: Seemeth it but a small thing unto you, that the God of Israel hath separated you from the congregation of Israel, to bring you near to himself to do the service of the tabernacle of the Lord, and to stand before the congregation to minister unto them?

verses.name: Numbers 16:10
verses.text: And he hath brought thee near to him, and all thy brethren the sons of Levi with thee: and seek ye the priesthood also?
